<div class="treeview">
<onlyinclude>** {{nbt|compound|minecraft:fireworks}}
*** {{nbt|byte|flight_duration}}: The flight duration of this firework rocket (and the number of gunpowders used to craft it). Must be an integer between -128 and 127. Defaults to 1. If specified, gray "Flight Duration: {{cd|<flight_duration>}}" text is added to the item's tooltip.
*** {{nbt|list|explosions}}: List of the explosion effects caused by this [[firework rocket]]. Has a maximum of 256 explosions. Each explosion is listed in the item's tooltip as its shape on the first line, then additional information such as color indented on further lines.
**** {{nbt|compound}}: A single explosion effect.
***** {{nbt|string|shape}}: The shape of the explosion. Can be {{cd|d=or|small_ball|large_ball|star|creeper|burst}}.
***** {{nbt|list|colors}}: The colors of the initial particles of the explosion, randomly selected from.
****** {{nbt|int}}{{nbt|list}} A color as a packed integer or list of three floats.
***** {{nbt|list|fade_colors}}: The colors of the fading particles of the explosion, randomly selected from.
****** {{nbt|int}}{{nbt|list}} A color as a packed integer or list of three floats.
***** {{nbt|boolean|has_trail}}: Whether or not the explosion has a trail effect (diamond).
***** {{nbt|boolean|has_twinkle}}: Whether or not the explosion has a twinkle effect (glowstone dust).<!--
--></onlyinclude></div><noinclude>
